title: Adobe Font folio -- OT edition, question
content:
Hi all,   
   
My friend bough this latest version of Adobe font folio in OT format. He was surprised when he found out that there aren�t certain glyphs in the package of western type fonts. By this I mean certain Croatian glyphs such as Č; č; Ć; ć. There are some "�; Đ; etc." but not all.   
   
I tried to access them thru glyph palette in Adobe illustrator CS, but much to my surprise there weren't there.   
Any info about this.   
   
thanks
author: mrfsrf

comments.content:
Luka -   
   
This might help:   
 [http://www.adobe.com/products/fontfolio/languages.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20050525001114/http:/www.adobe.com/products/fontfolio/languages.html)   
   
In short, not all OT fonts include extended language   
support. This is true for most foundries.
